verses.text: Mamin Jehová, a t'ayach tzin awaji ayic swalan in b'a. Swak' wal wip in k'anan t'ayach to tz'ok' a k'ool t'ayin.
D'a ichanh swal in b'a, a wal t'a ichanh swal wilk'olal.
Mamin Jehová, ayic manhxo animaoc waj swab'i, ojtak wal in b'e. Ha t'a jun b'e b'aj tzin b'ati, ata' ix yak'em yaal heb' ajk'ol t'ayin.
Tzin b'at k'elan t'a in wach', malaj junok mach sjawi yic tz'och wed'oc. Malaj mach tzin colani. Malaj mach tz'och ilk'olal wuuj, wach'chom tzin chami.
Mamin, a wal t'ayach swal in b'a, swalan icha tik: Ha t'ayach tzin col in b'a, a achnhej tzach in nib'ej t'a yichanh masanil tas t'a sat lu'um tik.
Cotanh k'elan t'ayin tzin awaj t'ayach, yujto malaj wip. Colinel t'a heb' tzin pechan b'eyek'oc, yujto te ay yip heb' t'a wichanh.
Ik' in elta t'a skal in yaelal in k'ana', yic wach' ol wal wach' lolonel t'ayach, haxo heb' anima wach' spensar ol och oyan heb' t'a in patic ayic ol ak'an a wach'k'olal t'ayin, xin chi.
